comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I recently watched Deadpool and Wolverine and did think it was very funny. Even though it has a lot of action scenes it still have plenty of comedy but for a mature audience.I really enjoy Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman especially when they portray their characters. It was like a fresh of breath air to see this type of movie. I really enjoyed it and recommended it to my mature friends. But I will not let my nephews watch it.

comments.body: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, 1987. A very funny and kind film, I advise everyone. It lifts the mood
